tasks.task: Participate in agricultural training workshops on vegetable grafting.
subtasks: Attend theoretical sessions covering local grafting research.
Learn about grafting tomatoes and sweet peppers onto rootstocks.
Understand performance against biotic and abiotic stresses.
Gain knowledge on reducing disease losses and pesticide use.
Implement vegetable grafting techniques on farms.
Recommend suitable vegetable varieties for grafting.
Participate in practical sessions (not specified but implied).

tasks.task: Participate in agricultural training workshops on vegetable grafting.
MAINTASK: Participate in agricultural training workshops on vegetable grafting.
subtasks: Attend theoretical sessions covering local grafting research.
Learn about grafting tomatoes and sweet peppers on rootstocks.
Understand performance against biotic and abiotic stresses.
Gain knowledge on reducing losses and pesticide use.
Plan to implement vegetable grafting techniques on individual farms.
Recommend suitable vegetable varieties for grafting.
